

GROUP
*id: email
name: string
description: string
profilePic: string(url)     -- POR DEFINIR 


VIDEO
*id: autogenerated
dateAdded: Timestamp
description: string
durationMins: int
durationSecs: int
img: string
likes: int
owner: string (email)
url: string (url)
title: string

- use a cookie storing the video id
